cards.title: Ember
powers: {EmberCharacter} deals 1 target 1 fire damage. You may draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: A hero target deals a target 1 fire damage, then deals a target 1 fire damage.

openingLines.default: Do ya have nothing better ta be doin'?
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: Sure he's a big lad, I'm sure he can take a beating.

cards.title: Bird of Prey
body: When {EmberCharacter} destroys a target, you may play a card or use a power.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: She enjoys hunting them, no matter{BR}what she tells you -- or herself.

cards.flavorReference: Judge Rustici, Guardians at the Gate #53

cards.title: Blaze of Glory
body: {EmberCharacter} deals each target 1 irreducible fire damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Craven Gilodeth, your ambition{BR}burned hotter than your honor, but{BR}not so hotly as your men!

cards.flavorReference: Sir Elisedd the Green, Valderion Shadows #7

cards.title: Brimstone Down
body: When you use a power, {EmberCharacter} may deal 1 target 1 fire damage.
At the end of each turn, {EmberCharacter} deals up to X targets 1 fire damage each, where X is the number of decks that have had cards revealed by your cards or powers this turn.

flavorQuotes.text: That so? A lil' birdie told me{BR}the cavalry ain't comin'.

cards.title: Burning Wings
body: The first time each instance of damage dealt by {EmberCharacter} would be reduced, increase that damage by 1.
powers: For each Blaze card in play, reveal and replace the top card of a deck. You may discard the top card of a deck. You may play a card or you may discard a card to use a power.

flavorQuotes.text: Don't tell her I said this, but she{BR}looks just like an angel! It's uncanny!

cards.title: Cleansing Fire
body: When {EmberCharacter} would deal a target fire damage, that target may regain that much HP instead. Reduce HP gained this way by 1 for each time HP has been regained this way this turn, to a minimum of 1.

flavorQuotes.text: Are ye both injured? Will I{BR}burn away yeer wounds?

cards.title: Dreams of Faerie
body: Draw a card.
{EmberCharacter} deals herself 2 psychic damage.
Reveal cards from the top of your deck until 3 Ongoings are revealed. Put 1 into your hand. Shuffle the other revealed cards back into your deck.

flavorQuotes.text: Claudia! Jen! She's on fire!{BR}[b]Everything's[/b] on fire!

cards.title: Everything Burns
body: Destroy an Ongoing or environment card.

cards.title: Flaming Slash
body: {EmberCharacter} deals up to 3 targets 2 melee and 1 fire damage each.

flavorQuotes.text: We are in pursuit of echoes of{BR}catalogued anomaly 52 south on Highway{BR}411, requesting reinforce-

cards.flavorReference: Agent Snow, Project Q: Numbered Days

cards.title: From the Ashes
body: When {EmberCharacter} drops to 0 or fewer HP, restore her to 7 HP, then remove this card from the game.
powers: Until the start of your next turn, whenever {EmberCharacter} is dealt fire damage, she regains 1 HP for each Blaze card in play, then increases the next damage she deals by 1. You may discard a card to use a power.

flavorQuotes.text: [y=0.90]I can't hear her.{BR}I don't think she's dead.
[y=0.90]She's a pile of ash--
[y=0.90]Ash and an ember--
[y=0.90]Of the fire--
[y=0.90]-- and the magic.

cards.title: Inner Warmth
body: 1 target regains 4 HP.

flavorQuotes.text: It's too late. I'm sorry. You{BR}couldn't have saved him, Roisin.
I could've and I can.

cards.title: Off the Path
body: The first time each turn {EmberCharacter} is dealt toxic, psychic, or infernal damage, you may draw or play a card.
powers: Reveal the top 2 cards of a deck. Put one on the top and one on the bottom.
cards.flavorText: “I don't want this curse-- this,{BR}this evil inside me! I just want{BR}to find my way back to the narrow{BR}path! Ye can't ask me to do this!”{BR}- Ember, Guardians at the Gate #47

cards.title: Reasonable Paranoia
body: Reduce damage dealt to {EmberCharacter} by 1.
At the start of your turn, draw a card, play a card, and destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: There's a team here.{BR}Newspaper fella, bike{BR}messenger, and a couple.
Not everyone is after you, Roisin.
Project Q! We've got to move!

cards.title: Scorching Shriek
body: {EmberCharacter} deals each non-hero target 1 sonic damage and 1 fire damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Cloudwalker One, you are clear to{BR}engage. Light it up! I want 'em to see it{BR}from space!

cards.flavorReference: General Janson, Apex Incursion: Operation Icarus #4

cards.title: Searing Talons
body: The first time each turn {EmberCharacter} deals each target fire damage, you may reduce the next damage dealt by that target by 1 for each Blaze card in play.
powers: You may discard a card to play a card. Then {EmberCharacter} deals a target 1 melee and 1 fire damage.

flavorQuotes.text: You are playing{BR}vis fire, little vun.
I [b]am[/b] fire, creature of ash!

cards.title: The Brightest Flame
body: {EmberCharacter} deals 1 target 2 fire damage. {EmberCharacter} may deal herself 2 irreducible fire damage. If she takes damage this way, you may discard a card to repeat the text of this card.

flavorQuotes.text: [y=0.90]There can be no{BR}victory, no escape. To{BR}oppose me is to defy the{BR}Sidhe. I am your doom.
[y=0.90]You're not. You're just{BR}another moth to the flame.

cards.title: What I Have Become
body: {EmberCharacter} deals herself up to X psychic damage, where X = the number of Blaze cards in play. For each point of damage she takes this way, you may use a power on a Blaze card.

flavorQuotes.text: You've shown me your nightmares.{BR}Now come see mine.

cards.flavorReference: Ember, Grim Tidings: An Ember in the Ashes

cards.title: Wreathed in Flame
body: Increase fire damage dealt by {EmberCharacter} by 1 for each Blaze card in play.
powers: Until the start of your next turn, the first time each turn {EmberCharacter} is dealt damage, she may deal the source of that damage 1 fire damage. You may discard a card to use a power.
cards.flavorText: {BR}“You have been garbed in{BR}resplendent glory, yet don lowly{BR}rags to cloak your riches. Cast off{BR}the trappings of your lessers!”{BR}- The Fury,{BR}Strange Stories: Dead Men's Tales
